mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_lookup (lookup_id, project_id, member_id, project_manager) VALUES((select nvl(max(lookup_id), 0) +1 from project_lookup), #{project_id}, #{member_id}, #{project_manager})
mapper.select: SELECT lookup_id, project_id, member_id, project_favorites, project_locker, hide_locker, project_manager, project_name, joinuser FROM project_lookup INNER JOIN ( SELECT project_id, member_id, project_favorites, project_locker, hide_locker, project_name, joinuser FROM project_locker INNER JOIN ( SELECT project_id, project_name, joinuser FROM projectdir INNER JOIN ( SELECT project_id, count(*) as joinuser from project_lookup group by project_id ) USING(project_id) ) USING(project_id) ) USING(project_id, member_id) WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY project_id ASC
